name: ExportForScreensOptionsPNG8

properties.name: colorCount
properties.description: Number of colors in exported color table.

properties.name: transparency
properties.description: Should the resulting image use transparency.

properties.name: interlaced
properties.description: Should the resulting image be interlaced.

properties.name: matte
properties.description: Should the artboard be matted with a color.

properties.name: matteColor
properties.description: The color to use when matting the artboard (default: white)

properties.name: antiAliasing
properties.description: Should the resulting image be antialiased.

properties.name: scaleType
properties.description: How should the resulting image be scaled.

properties.name: scaleTypeValue
properties.description: The value by which the resulting image should be scaled.

description: Options which may be provided when exporting a document as an 8 bit PNG file.
